summary: Embrace the shadows and dance with your sword to annihilate enemies nearby using the Quick Step and forbidden arts of the Sword Dance.
descriptionHtml:
*** NEW (and possibly final) version (3.1.2) of this mod available...

====================================================
This mod adds 3 powers to your game which should be added automatically.

Quick Step:
This power teleports you behind a random hostile NPC nearby. (If there is only one hostile enemy nearby, you will teleport behind him, evading attacks).

Sword Dance Charge:
This power (2-hand spell, last for 2 minutes) will be needed to charge Sword Dance. It will also give a 50% speed buff. Sword Dance cannot be used without this.

Sword Dance:
With a greatsword or a one-handed sword equipped on the right hand, this power will keep using Quick Step (only targeting hostile actors), and let you automatically attack targets, until all targets have been hit once. Then you will teleport back to where the power was cast, and you will perform a move that summons swords above each target and lunges towards them.

====================================================
All videos are from version 1.0

[youtube]QPR7VatqSgI[/youtube]  [youtube]PlIfx_N767s[/youtube]
[youtube]8Pgc-IeKlHc[/youtube]

====================================================
Updates:

Version 3.1.2
- Decreased range of Sword Dance back to 500 for 1000 might not work well.
- removed attack speed buff for greatswords - buggy (not restoring original speed)

If you're updating from 3.1, and you find yourself swinging faster than usual, type the following console command to restore your weapon speed to default:
player.setav weaponspeedmult 0

Version 3.1
- Removed once-a-day power version of Sword Dance (you can use the creation kit to change the lesser power to once a day power easily).
- Increased Sword Dance Charge duration from 1 minute to 2 minutes, staggers everyone nearby on cast, and added 50% speed buff. 
- Increased the attack speed of Sword Dance if wielding a greatsword.
- Doubled the range of Sword Dance from 500 to 1000.
- Fixed delay of falling swords (before, the enemies would die before getting stabbed in the head)
- Quick Step now only works on hostile targets.

Version 3.0
- Removed Chest and books, all 3 skills should now be added (and updated) automatically.
- Removed magicka and stamina cost.
- Sword Dance Charge is now a once a day power, will last 1 minute, which will enable multiple casts of Sword dance during that 1 minute. There is an alternative download to make this a lesser power instead (OP).
- Quickstep stamina cost increased from 5% to 10%.
- A bit faster responsiveness for the falling swords in Sword Dance.
- Fixed glitch that messes up the eyes.
- Added few more visual effects.

Version 2.0
- Sword Dance now needs to be charged using the spell 'Sword Dance Charge'. Learn the spell from the chest.

Version 1.2
- Added effect shaders to Sword Dance
- Removed Health sacrifice cost from Sword Dance
- Sword Dance no longer kills Dragons, Giants, Mammoths, Dragon Priests, and Centurions

Version 1.1
- Sword Dance should now only attack hostile targets
- Increased cost of Sword Dance to 90% base magicka, 50% base stamina
- Sword Dance now cuts current health in half (on cast)
- Increased Sword Dance swords (from above) damage to sure kill (except essential targets)
- Quick step now consumes stamina instead of magicka

Version 1.0
- Initial release

====================================================
Install/Uninstall/Compatibilities 

* To INSTALL, simply drop files in data folder or use NMM.
* To UNINSTALL, simply remove those same files or use NMM. (To prevent any problems after, wait a few days somewhere indoors where you haven't used any of the 3 spells of this mod in a while, then save, then uninstall)
* This should be compatible with all mods. Let me know otherwise.

** If the 3 spells does not automatically add, add them manually via console:
1. Press the tilde key (~)
2. type:  help "sword dance"
3. there should be 2 items of type "SPEL" that comes up. Take note of both of their 8 digit hex number
4. type:  help "quick step"
5. again, take note of the 8 digit hex number, you should now have the 3 IDs (8 digit hex) of the spells
6. type:  player.addspell XXXXXXXX
(where the Xs are the ID, do this for all 3 IDs)

** If you CTD on loading a save after you UNINSTALL, install again and follow these steps:
1. go somewhere else INDOORS, where you haven't cast any of the 3 spells in a few days...
2. optional: wait a few days...
3. save.
4. uninstall. 

====================================================
Permissions:

You can use this mod for your mod here on Nexus (only), as long as I'm given credit.
====================================================
author: Flippetized
